DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate absolute bioavailability , absorption excretion DA-1229 , IMP clinical assessment treatment T2DM . The oral IV PK DA-1229 also evaluate . The metabolism DA-1229 may also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Microtracer Study Establish Absolute Bioavailability Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion DA-1229
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age 18 55 BMI 18.0 30.0 kg/„é° History drug alcohol abuse past 2years Regular alcohol consumption nin male > 21 unit per week Current smoker smoke within last 12months Radiation Exposure Positive drug abuse test result Positive HBsAg , HCV Ab , HIV result Serious adverse reaction hypersensitivity drug formulation excipients Clinically significant allergy Donation loss blood within previous 3 month Taking prescribed OTC drug herbal remedy 14days IMP administration
